content: Doctors in the United States are cautiously optimistic about clinical trial results from the University of Oxford in England that suggest that a commonly used drug may have a real, measurable impact … [+6005 chars]

author: David K. Li
title: Woman sues NYC steakhouse claiming rampant sexual harassment
description: Brenna Gonzalez claims she was targeted by male colleagues and customers at Smith & Wollensky after she began working there in 2018.

title: What to know about Juneteenth, the emancipation holiday
description: This year Juneteenth, the commemoration of the end of slavery in the United States, will be celebrated by Black Americans amid a national reckoning on race.
